July 20, 1907 D Bradford Contest
Bradford Contest 0 Other
bradford-contest
None
Wagner [arr. Round]
Bradford, West Yorkshire, England, UK Correct spelling of Black Dike until around 1910 when it was changed to Black Dyke. 1st prize £20 and cup, 2nd prize £15, 3rd prize £10, 4th prize £5 divided between Batley Old and Wyke. 8 bands competed.
March 26, 2012, 7:25 p.m. Sept. 19, 2018, 8:24 p.m.
1 Black Dyke Mills Junior John Gladney Jnr
2 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band William Halliwell
3 Lindley Band Benjamin Lodge
4 Batley Old John Gladney Jnr
